sqlMap.select: select bs_code, bs.emp_code, emp_name, bs.dept_code, dept_name, dept_higher, dept_leader, bs.po_code, po_name, bs_st, bs_year, bs_goal, bs_date from bstatement bs, employee e, department d, position p where bs.emp_code = e.emp_code and bs.dept_code = d.dept_code and bs.po_code = p.po_code and bs.emp_code = #emp_code#
